full_summary:
### W0106-23JD04-3 Parts, Inspections and Repair Services for Vehicles

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**

**Identification Number:** WS4158664433

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of parts, inspections, maintenance and repair services for the vehicle fleet, including all models sold by the manufacturers Chrysler/Dodge.

**Key Details:**

* **Location:** This RFSO is applicable to Montreal.
* **Contract Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Open bidding (Competitive)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Number of Offers:** A maximum of one (1) standing offer can result from this RFSO

**Description:** The purpose of this RFSO is to provide parts, inspections, maintenance, and repair services for the vehicle fleet, including all models sold by the manufacturer Chrysler/Dodge. Contractors are invited to submit standing offers to provide these services.

**Key Requirements:**

*   **Lot 2: Dodge/Chrysler Vehicles**
*   **Annex A:** Contains detailed requirements for the provision of services.

**Important Notes:**

*   This RFSO cancels and supersedes previous Bid Solicitation number Doc4243780214, dated October 4th, 2023.
*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

**Timeline:**

*   **Publication Date:** October 31st, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 21st, 2023, at 14:00

**Contact Information:**

*   **Name:** Caty, Melanie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17878882?extsite=MTc4Nzg4ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17878882?extsite
